name: 力學（二）
description: 本課程提供物理系大學部理論力學一般的題材。
goals: 培養學生物理的歸納及推演能力
訓練學生解析的計算能力
令學生了解力學的發展歷史
使學生注意最新的發展
syllabus:
1. Coupled oscillators

2\. The loaded string

3. The continuous string

4. Wave equation

5. Group velocity and wave packet

6\. Calculus of variations

7. Hamilton's principle

8. Lagrangian dynamics

9\. Mid-term Exam.

10. Hamiltonian dynamics

11. Central-force motion

12. Planetary motion

13. Dynamics of a system of particles

14. Rutherford scattering

15. Noninertial reference frame

16. Inertia tensor

17\. Euler's equations

18\. Final Exam.

grading.note: There will be one midterm exam.
There will be one final exam.
There will be in class quiz.
